description: Three external solutions for 60-day degradation study of cement paste
data_source: Experimental specifications from degradation study (相关参数)

pure_water.description: Deionized water for leaching baseline study

composition_mol_L.notes: CO2-free to prevent carbonation, de-aerated if needed

pure_water.pH_evolution_note: Will increase due to alkali leaching from paste

preparation.degassing: Optional purging with N2 to remove dissolved CO2
preparation.storage: Sealed container to prevent CO2 absorption

degradation_mechanisms_expected: Alkali (Na, K) leaching from pore solution
pure_water.literature_reference: Jacques et al. (2010) - Four-stage leaching model

NaCl_solution.description: Sodium chloride solution for chloride attack study
NaCl_solution.pH_evolution_note: Slight increase from paste alkali release

preparation.dissolving_method: Dissolve 70.0 g NaCl in 1 L deionized water

degradation_mechanisms_expected: Potential C-S-H destabilization at high Cl/OH ratio

chloride_binding_capacity_expected.note: Based on typical OPC paste at w/b=0.3

NaCl_solution.literature_reference: Li et al. (2020) - NaCl attack mechanisms

mixed_salt_solution.solution_name: 10 g/L Na₂SO₄ + 70 g/L NaCl Mixed Solution
mixed_salt_solution.description: Combined sulfate and chloride attack solution

preparation.dissolving_method: Dissolve 10.0 g Na2SO4 and 70.0 g NaCl in 1 L deionized water
preparation.mixing_order: Add Na2SO4 first, dissolve, then add NaCl
preparation.stability: Stable at room temperature, no precipitation expected

degradation_mechanisms_expected: Potential formation of Kuzel's salt (mixed Cl/SO4 AFm)
mixed_salt_solution.literature_reference: Zuo et al. (2023) - Combined NaCl + sulfate attack on alkali-activated materials

analytical_methods.conductivity: Conductivity meter for ionic strength verification
analytical_methods.ICP_OES: For Na⁺, Ca²⁺, K⁺ analysis in equilibrated solutions
analytical_methods.titration: Mohr method for Cl⁻, complexometric for Ca²⁺

solution_replacement_schedule.immersion_condition: Low renewal rate - solution replaced every 3 days
solution_replacement_schedule.pressure_condition: High renewal rate - enhanced flow simulation

validation_notes.no_carbonation: CO2 excluded to isolate salt attack effects
validation_notes.literature_validated: Concentrations consistent with cement degradation studies
